name: Stenomega
description:
STENOMEGA (2023)

Puzzle-action game by Team Holly, with assets by MSU

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Year 21XX, the alien group Omega invaded our moon and tried to kidnap it back to its galaxy. Omega populated the surface of our moon with different complex patterns of their buddies to confuse the human beings. To save our moon, Professor Jack created the robot Step, who can navigate through the alien’s pattern, step on the enemies in high speed and then destroy them.

This game is targeted for general public who are 10 years old and above, and are interested in playing little puzzle games to spend their time. The player simply controls the robot Step from air, to fall and step on the aliens. After destroying one enemy, Step will be bounced back to air, to gain more energy and speed, and fall back to destroy more energy. If Step hits the background instead of some enemy, it will die.

Please enjoy and have fun.
